text: Kristen Schaal (born January 24, 1978) is an American stand-up comedienne, actress and voice artist. She is the voice of Mabel Pines in Gravity Falls. She also is the voice of Louise Belcher in Bob's Burgers and Uma Kinnik in Atlantis Forest. Schaal was born in Longmont, Colorado. ==Filmography== ===Animated Roles=== * Adventure Time - Boobafina, Jake Jr. * American Dad! - Girl, Librarian * Bob's Burgers - Louise Belcher * The High Fructose Adventures of Annoying Orange - Squash McAdams * Gravity Falls - Mabel Pines * Atlantis Forest - Uma Kinnik * The Penguins of Madagascar - Buffy the Rabbit, Fluffy the Rabbit, Muffy the Rabbit * The Simpsons - Louise Belcher ===Film Roles=== * Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2 - Barb the Orangutan * Despicable Me 2 - Shannon * Shrek Forever After - Palace Witch, Pumpkin Witch * Toy Story 3 - Trixie * Toy Story 4 - Trixie * Woody's Roundup: The Movie - Trixie ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American voice actors Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Colorado Category:Comedians from Colorado
title: Kristen Schaal
